typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	p1 as integer (1)
}
source(output(
		{Original Size} as string,
		{Corrected Size} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		Sk_tire_size as integer,
		Original_Size as string,
		Corrected_Size as string,
		change_ind as string,
		create_date as timestamp,
		update_date as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source2
source(output(
		join_key as integer,
		max_sk as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select 1 as join_key,coalesce(max(Sk_tire_size),0) as max_sk from tire_size_SCD',
	format: 'query') ~> source3
source1, source2 join({Original Size} == Original_Size,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Lookup1 alterRow(upsertIf(not(isNull({Original Size}))&&not(isNull(Original_Size)))) ~> AlterRow1
SurrogateKey1 derive(create_date = currentTimestamp(),
		update_date = currentTimestamp(),
		change_ind = 'Y',
		Sk_tire_size = Sk_tire_size+max_sk) ~> DerivedColumn1
AlterRow1 derive(update_date = currentTimestamp(),
		change_ind = 'Y') ~> DerivedColumn2
AlterRow1 keyGenerate(output(Sk_tire_size as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
Join1 derive(join_cond = 1) ~> DerivedColumn4
DerivedColumn4, source3 lookup(join_cond == join_key,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		Sk_tire_size as integer,
		Original_Size as string,
		Corrected_Size as string,
		change_ind as string,
		create_date as timestamp,
		update_date as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Sk_tire_size,
		Original_Size = {Original Size},
		Corrected_Size = {Corrected Size},
		change_ind,
		create_date,
		update_date
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
DerivedColumn2 sink(input(
		Sk_tire_size as integer,
		Original_Size as string,
		Corrected_Size as string,
		change_ind as string,
		create_date as timestamp,
		update_date as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Original_Size'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Original_Size = {Original Size},
		Corrected_Size = {Corrected Size},
		change_ind,
		update_date
	),
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink2
